reviewText: This is  an excellent book to learn  Brush lettering. With very little practice  you  will be able to make  the  letters  as shown in the book. It  doesn't take any  special skill, just a bit of  practice and you  are on you way to making lovely letters. I am glad I bought this  book. I am not  one to  learn things on my own. I  usually do much  better with someone showing me something but  this  book is easy  peasy to learn the techniques  .Highly  recommend this book.
very satisfied. thank you' easy to follow instructions, VCR tape very useful. Would recommend to anyone. Easy to use.. Great tips.
